benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: GET /1.0/kb/credits/{creditId} - Retrieve a credit by id

covered: Valid Request: TC01 and TC02 verify successful retrieval for CREDIT_ADJ and CBA_ADJ
Empty Response / No Data: TC03 and TC18 verify 404 when no matching data or system is empty
Query Parameters: TC08 demonstrates extra param ignored; TC05 validates invalid creditId format
Authorization: TC06 and TC07 verify 401 for missing/expired tokens
Error Handling: multiple scenarios cover 400 and 404 responses for invalid IDs and mismatched types (e.g., TC04, TC05, TC11, TC16, TC17, TC14, TC18)
Boundary/Edge: TC14 (very large UUID), TC16 (truncated UUID), TC17 (whitespace-padded)
Performance/Degradation: TC09 under load, TC19 concurrent requests
Backward compatibility & Regression: TC20 and TC15
gaps: Pagination: not applicable for single-resource GET; no pagination tests needed
Caching Behavior: no tests for caching headers (ETag, Cache-Control)
Rate Limiting: no explicit rate-limiting tests
Server error coverage: no test for 500 Internal Server Error
recommendations: Add a test for 403 Forbidden to cover insufficient permissions
Add tests to validate caching headers (ETag, Cache-Control) in responses
Add 500 Internal Server Error test to simulate server/database failure
Add rate-limiting/throttling tests; e.g., burst of requests
Optionally add pagination tests if the API evolves to list resources; or explicitly mark as N/A
